name: Game Name (Cosmic Adventure Squad)
description:
Have you ever wanted to participate in a game jam, but just didn't have the time? Now you can in "GAME NAME"! Complete activities in 10 second blocks and make your dreams come true. Create art, write code, compose music, make designs, and so much more! 

What will your final ratings be? See how you rank after the 3rd day!

  • Experience a full game jam in 10 second increments!
  • Play 12 unique minigames!
  • Real rating calculations!

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51 Jam. The theme was "every 10 seconds". 

Join the Discord!

Note: The game may take a moment to load. If the game does not load you may have to enable WebGL on your browser.

Controls
  • Mouse - click or drag
  • Keyboard - type
  • WASD/Arrows - move or hit notes

** Each mini game has its own controls.

Credits

Developed by Cosmic Adventure Squad (@squad_cosmic) 

Support us on Ko-Fi!

  • Vu Ha (@stregawolf) - Code
  • Rose Peng (@ouroborose) - Art
  • Johan Soriao  (@tenlki) - Code/Audio
